Miriam Suzanne » Colors

$brand-colors (Map)

scss 
$brand-colors: (
  '_brand-main': hsl(195, 52%, 31%),
  '_brand-accent': hsl(330, 100%, 45%),
  '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main'
    (
      'desaturate': 30%,
    ),
);

The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors.

Color Previews

_brand-main #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%)
_brand-accent #e60073 rgb(230, 0, 115) hsl(330, 100%, 45%)
_brand-gray #3e5860 rgb(62, 88, 96) hsl(194, 22%, 31%)

$main-shades (Map)

scss 
$main-shades: shades-of(
  (
    '_brand-main': color('_brand-main'),
  ),
  6
);

Tints and shades of the main brand color.

$light-theme (Map)

scss 
$light-theme: (
  'background': '#_brand-gray-light-6',
  'feature': '#_brand-accent-dark-5',
  'callout': '#_brand-gray-light-5',
  'text-shadow': '#_contrast-light',
);

These colors form the basis of the light theme

Color Previews

background #f1f3f3 rgb(241, 243, 243) hsl(180, 8%, 95%)
feature #5f002f rgb(95, 0, 47) hsl(330, 100%, 19%)
callout #dee2e4 rgb(222, 226, 228) hsl(200, 10%, 88%)
text-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%)

$dark-theme (Map)

scss 
$dark-theme: (
  'background': '#_brand-gray-dark-6',
  'callout': '#_brand-gray-dark-5',
  'text-shadow': '#_contrast-dark',
);

These colors form the basis of the dark theme

Color Previews

background #151d20 rgb(21, 29, 32) hsl(196, 21%, 10%)
callout #30444b rgb(48, 68, 75) hsl(196, 22%, 24%)
text-shadow #000000 rgb(0, 0, 0) hsl(0, 0%, 0%)

$theme-colors (Map)

scss 
$theme-colors: (
  'overlay': '#background'
    (
      'alpha': 0.8,
    ),
  'text': '#callout'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($main-shades), 'aaa'),
    ),
  'text-light': '#background'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($gray-shades), 'aa'),
    ),
  'text-highlight': '#background'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($main-shades), 'aa'),
    ),
  'border': '#background'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($gray-shades), 'aa-large'),
    ),
  'action': '#callout'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($accent-shades), 'aa'),
    ),
  'action-underline': '#action'
    (
      'alpha': 0.5,
    ),
  'action-hover': '#callout'
    (
      'contrast': append(map-keys($accent-shades), 'aaa'),
    ),
  'feature': '#action-hover',
);

These colors are calculated in relation to the given theme

$light-colors (Map)

scss 
$light-colors: map-merge($colors, $light-theme);

The full color map for implementing the light-theme

Color Previews

background #f1f3f3 rgb(241, 243, 243) hsl(180, 8%, 95%)
feature,  action-hover #5f002f rgb(95, 0, 47) hsl(330, 100%, 19%)
callout #dee2e4 rgb(222, 226, 228) hsl(200, 10%, 88%)
text-shadow #ffffff rgb(255, 255, 255) hsl(0, 0%, 100%)
overlay #f1f3f3 rgba(241, 243, 243, 0.8) hsla(180, 8%, 95%, 0.8)
text #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%)
text-light #5a7077 rgb(90, 112, 119) hsl(194, 14%, 41%)
text-highlight #316c7f rgb(49, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%)
border #6d8187 rgb(109, 129, 135) hsl(194, 11%, 48%)
action #95004a rgb(149, 0, 74) hsl(330, 100%, 29%)
action-underline #95004a rgba(149, 0, 74, 0.5) hsla(330, 100%, 29%, 0.5)

$dark-colors (Map)

scss 
$dark-colors: map-merge($colors, $dark-theme);

The full color map for implementing the dark-theme
